AvenueQ:
The sun is shining, it's a lovely day,
 阳光灿烂，多美好的一天，	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -9 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
A perfect morning for a kid to play,
 这美好早晨，孩子尽情玩。	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -8 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
But you're got lots of bills to pay
 但你得付很多账单	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
What can you do?
 你怎么办？	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -8 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

Your work real hard and the pay's real low
 你工作很辛苦，薪水却很低	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And every hour goes oh, so slow
 每小时过得真慢啊	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And at the end of the day there's no where to go
 白天忙忙碌碌，夜幕降临无归处	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -9 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
Back home to Avenue Q
 回到Q街的家去	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
YouAreNotAlone:
Have you ever felt like nobody was there
 你可曾感到孤独无人陪伴	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -8 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Have you ever felt forgotten in the middle of nowhere
 你是否曾感到被遗忘，在茫茫人海间	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -8 len_constraint: 15 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Have you ever felt like you could disappear
 你可曾感觉像要消失一般，	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -8 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Like you could fall and no one would hear
 就像你坠落，无人听见	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -8 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

Well, let that lonely feeling wash away
 让那份孤独感冲刷而去	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -9 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Maybe there's a reason to believe you'll be okay
 或许有理由相信，你终会安然无恙	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -7 len_constraint: 14 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
Cause when you don't feel strong enough to stand
 因为你不够坚强站不住	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -7 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
You can reach, reach out your hand
 伸出手，寻求帮助。	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

Even when the dark comes crashing through
 即便是黑暗来袭横扫	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -7 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
When you need a friend to carry you
 当你需要朋友来依靠	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -8 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And when you're broken on the ground
 当你倒地，心如刀绞	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 3 reward3: 3)
You will be found
 会被找到	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -7 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)

So let the sun come streaming in
 就让阳光尽情照耀	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -9 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
Cause you'll reach up and you'll rise again
 因为你终将振翅高飞	(rhyme type: 7 scores: -7 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
Lift your head and look around
 抬起头，四处瞧瞧	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
You will be found
 会被找到	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -7 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
OnlyUs:
I don't need you to sell me on reasons to want you
 我不需要你说服我，因为你很好	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -7 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
I don't need you to search for the proof that I should
 我无需你寻找我应该的理由	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -7 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
You don't have to convince me
 无须多言说服我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
You don't have to be scared you're not enough
 你不必害怕自己不够好	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -8 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
'Cause what we've got going is good
 我们之间感觉很好	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

I don't need more reminders of all that's been broken
 不必再提醒我那些破碎的往事	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -9 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
I don't need you to fix what I'd rather forget
 不必修好那些宁愿忘记的事	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Clear the slate and start over
 擦干净，重新开始	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Try to quiet the noises in your head
 尝试让脑中的喧嚣沉寂	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -9 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
We can't compete with all that
 我们难以匹敌	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -5 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

So what if it's us?
 若是我们呢？	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -6 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
What if it's us And only us
 若是我俩，仅此而已	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
And what came before won't count anymore or matter?
 那之前的事，不再重要，也没关系？	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Can we try that?
 我们试试？	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

What if it's you
 若是你呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And what if it's me
 如果是我呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And what if that's all that we need it to be
 若那正是我们所需，又如何？	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
And the rest of the world falls away?
 世界其他都消逝，如何？	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 3 reward3: 3)
What do you say?
 你怎么说？	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

I never thought there'd be someone like you who would want me
 我从没想过会有人像你这样喜欢我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 15 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
So I give you ten thousand reasons to not let me go
 所以我给你万个理由不要离开我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 14 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
But if you really see me
 但如果你真的懂我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
If you like me for me and nothing else
 只要你喜欢我，不为别的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Well, that's all that I've wanted for longer that you could possibly know
 那正是我长久以来所渴望的，你知道的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 16 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
IMissTheMountains:
All these blank and tranquil years
 悠悠岁月静如斯	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 3 reward3: 3)
Seems they've dried up all my tears
 泪水干涸，似已逝	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 3 reward3: 3)
And while she runs free and fast
 当她自由奔跑时	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Seems my wild days are past
 野性岁月已逝	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 3 reward3: 3)

But I miss the mountains
 但我想念山川	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -8 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I miss the dizzy heights
 山峰让我怀念	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -7 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
All the manic magic days
 疯狂的魔法日子	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And the dark depressing nights
 黑暗压抑的夜晚	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -9 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)

I miss the mountains
 我想念山川	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -8 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I miss the highs and lows
 高低起伏，怀念	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -7 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
All the climbing all the falling
 攀登坠落无尽循环	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -9 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
All the while the wild wind blows
 山间狂风吹不断。	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -9 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
Stinging you with snow
 雪中刺骨寒	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -9 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
And soaking you with rain
 淋湿你，雨绵绵	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -9 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
I miss the mountains
 我想念山川	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -8 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I miss the pain
 思念痛感	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -7 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
YouDontKnow:
Do you wake up in the morning
 早晨醒来，感觉如何	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And need help to lift your head
 需要帮助抬头，哦	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Do you read obituaries
 看讣告，羡慕逝者	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
And feel jealous of the dead
 感到羡慕逝去者	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
It's like living on a cliffside
 犹如悬崖边上生活	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Not knowing when you'll dive
 不知何时坠落	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Do you know, Do you know
 你知道，你知道	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -6 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
What it's like to die alive
 生活如死般折磨	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -9 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

When a world that once had color
 当多彩世界渐褪色	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 3 reward3: 3)
Fades to white and grey and black
 色彩褪去，变白灰黑	(rhyme type: 7 scores: -7 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
When tomorrow terrifies you
 当未来让你恐惧时	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
But you'll die if you look back
 但回首必死无疑	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

You don't know
 不知道	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -8 len_constraint: 3 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I know you don't know
 我知你未晓	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -7 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
You say that you're hurting
 你说你受伤了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -6 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
It sure doesn't show
 你不知道	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -7 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
You don't know
 你不懂	(rhyme type: 13 scores: -6 len_constraint: 3 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
It lays me so low
 让我好难过	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -6 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
When you say let go
 当你说放掉	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -7 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
And I say You don't know
 我说你不知道	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -7 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
